SELECTIONREQUIRED: Please select a week and a number of participants
WELCOME:
Welcome to the registrations for the Castle Weeks 2022.


In the next step you can register a maximum of 3 children for a maximum of 1 week.
(If you want to register more children, you have to repeat the registration a second time with a different eMail address).

The places are limited.

First you make a provisional registration, which guarantees you the next available places. After that you will have a reasonable time to fill in your data.
After the last step, the registration will get the status 'definite'. If the time elapses, the reservation will be automatically cancelled.

All places obove this limit will be put on the waiting list. You will be notified if your children move up and your registration is changed. If you do not wish to have your registrations on the waiting list, you can delete them at the end.

Please click now on [>] resp. [Continue].

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact
CONTACT.FIRSTNAMEMINIMUMLENGTH: The first name must be longer than 3 characters.
CONTACT.LASTNAMEMAXLEMNGTH: The last name must be less than 50 characters.
CONTACT.ZIPMINLENGTH: The last name must be at least 4 digits.
CONTACT.ZIPMAXLENGTH: The last name must be less than 5 digits.
